mapper.sql: CAR_ID, CAR_CODE, CAR_NAME, BRAND_ID,CAR_TYPE_ID, CATEGORY_ID, CAR_LEVEL, SUV, DESCRIPTION, DATA_LEVEL, CAR_LONG, CAR_WIDTH, CAR_HIGH, WHEEL_BASE, WHEEL_RADIUS, FRONT_SUSPENSION, REAR_SUSPENSION, RIDE_HEIGHT, CAR_WEIGHT, PRICE, ORIGIN, HANDLE_CHARGE_MULTIPLE, BILL_STATUS, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, CHECKER, CHECK_DATE, CORP_ID, FLAG

car.CAR_ID, car.CAR_CODE, car.CAR_NAME, car.BRAND_ID,brand.BRAND_NAME,car.CAR_TYPE_ID,carType.CAR_TYPE_NAME, car.CATEGORY_ID,category.CATEGORY_NAME, car.CAR_LEVEL, car.SUV, car.DESCRIPTION,car.DATA_LEVEL,car.CAR_LONG, car.CAR_WIDTH,car.CAR_HIGH,WHEEL_BASE, car.WHEEL_RADIUS, car.FRONT_SUSPENSION, car.REAR_SUSPENSION, car.RIDE_HEIGHT,car.CAR_WEIGHT,car.PRICE, car.ORIGIN, car.HANDLE_CHARGE_MULTIPLE, car.BILL_STATUS,car.CREATOR,us.USER_NAME AS CREATE_NAME, car.CREATE_TIME, car.CHECKER,u.USER_NAME AS CHECKER_NAME, car.CHECK_DATE,car.CORP_ID,c.CORP_NAME,car.FLAG

where car.del = 0 and car.CAR_ID = #{carId} and car.CAR_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{carCode},'%') and car.CAR_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{carName},'%') and car.BRAND_ID = #{brandId} and car.CAR_TYPE_ID = #{carTypeId} and car.CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId} and car.CAR_LEVEL = #{carLevel} and car.SUV = #{suv} and car.DESCRIPTION = #{description} and car.DATA_LEVEL = #{dataLevel} and car.CAR_LONG = #{carLong} and car.CAR_WIDTH = #{carWidth} and car.CAR_HIGH = #{carHigh} and car.WHEEL_BASE = #{wheelBase} and car.WHEEL_RADIUS = #{wheelRadius} and car.FRONT_SUSPENSION = #{frontSuspension} and car.REAR_SUSPENSION = #{rearSuspension} and car.RIDE_HEIGHT = #{rideHeight} and car.CAR_WEIGHT = #{carWeight} and car.PRICE = #{price} and car.ORIGIN = #{origin} and car.HANDLE_CHARGE_MULTIPLE = #{handleChangeMultiple} and car.BILL_STATUS = #{billStatus} and car.CREATOR = #{creator} and car.CREATE_TIME = #{createTime} and car.CHECKER = #{checker} and car.CHECK_DATE = #{checkDate} and car.CORP_ID = #{corpId} and car.FLAG = #{flag} and (car.CAR_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchContent},'%') or car.CAR_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchContent},'%') or brand.BRAND_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchContent},'%') ) and car.CREATE_TIME >= #{startTime} and car.CREATE_TIME <= #{endTime} and car.CHECK_DATE >= #{startCheckDate} and car.CHECK_DATE <= #{endCheckDate} and brand.BRAND_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{refBrandName},'%') and carType.CAR_TYPE_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{refCarTypeName},'%') and category.CATEGORY_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{refCategoryName},'%')
mapper.select: select FROM bd_car car JOIN bd_brand brand ON car.BRAND_ID=brand.BRAND_ID LEFT JOIN bd_car_type carType ON car.CAR_TYPE_ID=carType.CAR_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN bd_category category ON car.CATEGORY_ID=category.CATEGORY_ID JOIN bd_user us ON car.CREATOR=us.USER_ID LEFT JOIN bd_user u ON car.CHECKER=u.USER_ID JOIN sys_corp c ON car.CORP_ID=c.CORP_ID where car.DEL=0 AND car.CAR_ID = #{carId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.update: update BD_CAR set DEL=1 where CAR_ID = #{carId}
update BD_CAR set DEL=1 where CAR_ID in #{carId}
mapper.insert: insert into BD_CAR (CAR_CODE, CAR_NAME, BRAND_ID,CAR_TYPE_ID, CATEGORY_ID, CAR_LEVEL, SUV, DESCRIPTION, DATA_LEVEL, CAR_LONG, CAR_WIDTH, CAR_HIGH, WHEEL_BASE, WHEEL_RADIUS, FRONT_SUSPENSION, REAR_SUSPENSION, RIDE_HEIGHT, CAR_WEIGHT, PRICE, ORIGIN, HANDLE_CHARGE_MULTIPLE, BILL_STATUS, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, CHECKER, CHECK_DATE, CORP_ID, FLAG) values (#{carCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brandId,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{carTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{categoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{carLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{suv,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{carLong,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{carWidth,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{carHigh,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{wheelBase,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{wheelRadius,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{frontSuspension,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rearSuspension,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rideHeight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{carWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{origin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{handleChangeMultiple,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{billStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{checker,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{checkDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into BD_CAR CAR_CODE, CAR_NAME, BRAND_ID, CAR_TYPE_ID, CATEGORY_ID, CAR_LEVEL, SUV, DESCRIPTION, DATA_LEVEL, CAR_LONG, CAR_WIDTH, CAR_HIGH, WHEEL_BASE, WHEEL_RADIUS, FRONT_SUSPENSION, REAR_SUSPENSION, RIDE_HEIGHT, CAR_WEIGHT, PRICE, ORIGIN, HANDLE_CHARGE_MULTIPLE, BILL_STATUS, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, CHECKER, CHECK_DATE, CORP_ID, FLAG, #{carCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brandId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{carTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{categoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{carLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{suv,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{carLong,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{carWidth,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{carHigh,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{wheelBase,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{wheelRadius,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{frontSuspension,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rearSuspension,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rideHeight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{carWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{origin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{handleChangeMultiple,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{billStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{checker,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{checkDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update: update BD_CAR CAR_CODE = #{carCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CAR_NAME = #{carName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BRAND_ID = #{brandId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CAR_TYPE_ID = #{carTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CAR_LEVEL = #{carLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SUV = #{suv,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATA_LEVEL = #{dataLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CAR_LONG = #{carLong,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CAR_WIDTH = #{carWidth,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CAR_HIGH = #{carHigh,jdbcType=INTEGER}, WHEEL_BASE = #{wheelBase,jdbcType=INTEGER}, WHEEL_RADIUS = #{wheelRadius,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FRONT_SUSPENSION = #{frontSuspension,jdbcType=INTEGER}, REAR_SUSPENSION = #{rearSuspension,jdbcType=INTEGER}, RIDE_HEIGHT = #{rideHeight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CAR_WEIGHT = #{carWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ORIGIN = #{origin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HANDLE_CHARGE_MULTIPLE = #{handleChangeMultiple,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, BILL_STATUS = #{billStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CHECKER = #{checker,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CHECK_DATE = #{checkDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CORP_ID = #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, where CAR_ID = #{carId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update BD_CAR CAR_CODE = #{carCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CAR_NAME = #{carName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BRAND_ID = #{brandId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CAR_TYPE_ID = #{carTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CAR_TYPE_ID = null, CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CATEGORY_ID = null, CAR_LEVEL = #{carLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SUV = #{suv,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = null, DATA_LEVEL = #{dataLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CAR_LONG = #{carLong,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CAR_LONG = null, CAR_WIDTH = #{carWidth,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CAR_WIDTH = null, CAR_HIGH = #{carHigh,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CAR_HIGH = null, WHEEL_BASE = #{wheelBase,jdbcType=INTEGER}, WHEEL_BASE = null, WHEEL_RADIUS = #{wheelRadius,jdbcType=INTEGER}, WHEEL_RADIUS = null, FRONT_SUSPENSION = #{frontSuspension,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FRONT_SUSPENSION = null, REAR_SUSPENSION = #{rearSuspension,jdbcType=INTEGER}, REAR_SUSPENSION = null, RIDE_HEIGHT = #{rideHeight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, RIDE_HEIGHT = null, CAR_WEIGHT = #{carWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, CAR_WEIGHT = null, PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PRICE = null, ORIGIN = #{origin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORIGIN =null, HANDLE_CHARGE_MULTIPLE = #{handleChangeMultiple,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, BILL_STATUS = #{billStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CHECKER = #{checker,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CHECK_DATE = #{checkDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CORP_ID = #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, where CAR_ID = #{carId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update BD_CAR set CAR_CODE = #{carCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CAR_NAME = #{carName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BRAND_ID = #{brandId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CAR_TYPE_ID=#{carTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CAR_LEVEL = #{carLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SUV = #{suv,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATA_LEVEL = #{dataLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CAR_LONG = #{carLong,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CAR_WIDTH = #{carWidth,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CAR_HIGH = #{carHigh,jdbcType=INTEGER}, WHEEL_BASE = #{wheelBase,jdbcType=INTEGER}, WHEEL_RADIUS = #{wheelRadius,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FRONT_SUSPENSION = #{frontSuspension,jdbcType=INTEGER}, REAR_SUSPENSION = #{rearSuspension,jdbcType=INTEGER}, RIDE_HEIGHT = #{rideHeight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CAR_WEIGHT = #{carWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ORIGIN = #{origin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HANDLE_CHARGE_MULTIPLE = #{handleChangeMultiple,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, BILL_STATUS = #{billStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CHECKER = #{checker,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CHECK_DATE = #{checkDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CORP_ID = #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where CAR_ID = #{carId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select FROM bd_car car JOIN bd_brand brand ON car.BRAND_ID=brand.BRAND_ID LEFT JOIN bd_car_type carType ON car.CAR_TYPE_ID=carType.CAR_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN bd_category category ON car.CATEGORY_ID=category.CATEGORY_ID JOIN bd_user us ON car.CREATOR=us.USER_ID LEFT JOIN bd_user u ON car.CHECKER=u.USER_ID JOIN sys_corp c ON car.CORP_ID=c.CORP_ID ORDER BY car.CREATE_TIME DESC

select FROM bd_car car JOIN bd_brand brand ON car.BRAND_ID=brand.BRAND_ID LEFT JOIN bd_car_type carType ON car.CAR_TYPE_ID=carType.CAR_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN bd_category category ON car.CATEGORY_ID=category.CATEGORY_ID JOIN bd_user us ON car.CREATOR=us.USER_ID LEFT JOIN bd_user u ON car.CHECKER=u.USER_ID JOIN sys_corp c ON car.CORP_ID=c.CORP_ID order by car.CREATE_TIME DESC

SELECT car.CAR_ID AS carId ,car.CAR_NAME AS carName ,car.CAR_CODE AS carCode ,brand.BRAND_ID AS brandId,brand.BRAND_NAME AS brandName, car.CAR_TYPE_ID AS carTypeId,carType.CAR_TYPE_NAME AS carTypeName FROM bd_car car JOIN bd_brand brand ON car.BRAND_ID=brand.BRAND_ID LEFT JOIN bd_car_type carType ON car.CAR_TYPE_ID=carType.CAR_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN bd_category category ON car.CATEGORY_ID=category.CATEGORY_ID JOIN bd_user us ON car.CREATOR=us.USER_ID LEFT JOIN bd_user u ON car.CHECKER=u.USER_ID JOIN sys_corp c ON car.CORP_ID=c.CORP_ID and car.BILL_STATUS=1 order by ${orderByClause}

select FROM bd_car car JOIN bd_brand brand ON car.BRAND_ID=brand.BRAND_ID LEFT JOIN bd_car_type carType ON car.CAR_TYPE_ID=carType.CAR_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN bd_category category ON car.CATEGORY_ID=category.CATEGORY_ID JOIN bd_user us ON car.CREATOR=us.USER_ID LEFT JOIN bd_user u ON car.CHECKER=u.USER_ID JOIN sys_corp c ON car.CORP_ID=c.CORP_ID WHERE car.CAR_NAME = #{carName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select FROM bd_car WHERE del = 0 and flag = 0 and CAR_NAME in #{name}
SELECT CAR_ID FROM bd_car WHERE CAR_NAME = #{modelName} AND FLAG = 0 AND DEL = 0

select FROM bd_car car JOIN bd_brand brand ON car.BRAND_ID=brand.BRAND_ID LEFT JOIN bd_car_type carType ON car.CAR_TYPE_ID=carType.CAR_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN bd_category category ON car.CATEGORY_ID=category.CATEGORY_ID JOIN bd_user us ON car.CREATOR=us.USER_ID LEFT JOIN bd_user u ON car.CHECKER=u.USER_ID JOIN sys_corp c ON car.CORP_ID=c.CORP_ID where car.DEL=0 AND car.CAR_CODE = #{carCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND car.BRAND_ID = #{brandId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND car.CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND car.CAR_TYPE_ID=#{carTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND car.CAR_TYPE_ID IS NULL
select FROM bd_car where del = 0 and flag = 0 and CAR_ID in #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
